title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: August 20, 2022, 07:46:09 PMLast edit: August 20, 2022, 08:11:45 PM by minerjones
content: As a thank you to forum collectors, Cardsmiths has donated an uncut Beryl Refractor sheet of the first 18 cards in the set for a free raffle Â Only requirement is that you have bought some cards.Can be direct from them, me, ebay, or other source.To qualify for a slot, post a picture of one of your cards with your username and date/timeLimit 1 entry per account. New accounts will be subject to review to prevent fraudulent entries.We reserve the right to deny a slot to any user.Raffle will run for 6 days, until this coming Friday, August 26 2022.Will close it at 4PM PDT and then pick a winner based on a future block hash.If a spot is not filled/chosen and comes up, the next block hash will be used until a winner is selected.Good luck everyone!!!
